data.text: @Kimble_Bent @henrycooke It might be, I think its up to what the police want
@Robyntwo @henrycooke There's still about 160 people not vaccinated. Majority are tho. Unvaccinated cant be deployed to assist in an emergency,
@LouieTheRed1 @henrycooke It should be appealed and I assume it will be.

@henrycooke The Police/defence requested the mandates. example you cant deploy the defense force to assist ie Tonga if they are not vaccinated same with the police. Majority of police/defence are vaccinated now.
@johnzemmiphobia @berenddeboer @henrycooke Rearend deboer doesn't understand the legal system, and the judge doesn't understand medicine.
@henrycooke I know the DF has internal vaccine policies (you gotta be vaxed to the max), but do the police?
@Mau_Keta @seravorn @henrycooke Mandates are immoral and illegal when they are used to "nudge" the public into taking a drug by public exclusion.

@Mau_Keta @henrycooke And that achieved what exactly? The judge's summary noted there was only "one concrete example of affected workers" .." a reference to a NZDF diving team  whose capacity was interrupted because of COVID-19 infection. But the advice pointed out that the divers were all vaccinated"
